title: U.S. consumer perception of Amazon as a company 2017
summary: This statistic shows , according to survey respondents , the most important election issues that should be addressed in the run up to the 2015 United Kingdom ( uk ) General election ( as of 2014 ) . With 50 percent of respondents , immigration was considered to be the most important topic , followed by the National Health Service ( nhs ) and the european union ( EU ) .

data.Response: With Amazon I get what I need
I trust Amazon with my payment information
Amazon takes the interests of its customers seriously
Amazon assumes a pioneering role in this day and age
Amazon is an integral part of my life
I would like to see more products and services from Amazon
There are no alternatives to Amazon

gold: The statistic shows U.S. consumer opinions on Amazon in general as of March 2017 . As of the Statista survey , 67 percent of survey respondents stated that they liked using Amazon . A third of respondents also stated that Amazon was an integral part of their life .
